data.title: Music Composition Major/Minor
data.meta_description: Compose sacred or secular music, teach at high school or college levels, or prepare for graduate school with a Music Composition major from Taylor University.
data.text:
Do you have a passion inside you to create music? A desire that you can’t shake off, that almost has a life of its own?

It’s time to take your passion to the next level with a Music Composition major. In exploring your musical and creative gifts at Taylor, you will develop your individual composition style; experiment with different instruments and textures of sound; discover ways to realize your music through technology; and consider the various roles of music in different cultures around the globe.

Your faculty have walked in your shoes, and they are ready to shepherd you towards your goals of making music with purpose and excellence. Every Music Composition student concludes their music education with a senior recital, performing their original compositions.
